title: Result of an increase in input prices

content.question: An increase in input prices will result in which of the following?

choices.label: A rightward shift in the money supply curve
A rightward shift in the aggregate demand curve
A rightward shift in the short-run Phillips curve
A rightward shift in the demand for loanable funds curve
A rightward shift in the short-run aggregate supply curve

content.answer: A rightward shift in the short-run Phillips curve

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
